titles.title: He Whom The Son Sets Free Is Free Indeed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He whom the Son sets free is free indeed
Completely liberated from the curse of the law.
He whom the Son sets free is free indeed.
He's free to be a servant of the most high God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Where the Spirit of the Lord is there is liberty,
And I am not entangled with the yoke of slavery.
For Jesus is the Truth who has come to set us free.
We are free. We are free. We are free.
